publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2280 Angus MacKay: Protection of Wild Mammals (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Protection of Wild Mammals (Scotland) Bill, agrees to – (a) the expenditure payable out of the Scottish Consolidated Fund of the expenses of the Scottish Ministers in consequence of the Act; and (b) any payments made to the Scottish Ministers under the Act. Supported by: Ross Finnie*, Rhona Brankin*, Peter Peacock*
